ComicInfo.Summary: THE LIVING CORPSE'S friend LILITH has been transformed into the thing that she has always wanted to be - a blood sucking VAMPIRE! But will it be everything that she's dreamed of or will she find that the grass is always greener on the other grave? And will THE LIVING CORPSE even let her survive the experience? Also find out what happened that first night that THE LIVING CORPSE came back from the grave and took the job of keeping the dead... dead.
